process.name: Create AD user with input credentials for multi forest

subsheet.name: Check Active Directory Auth is Available
Create AD user (Search with sith Credentials)

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Sign in Active Directorry
input.narrative: Do you want sign in using Active Directory

input.name: Sign in
input.narrative: Do you want sign in using legacy sso environment

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

stage.name: Check Active Directory Auth is Available

input.name: Authentication - AD
input.narrative: Authentication Type - AD Authentication

input.name: Negative Test
input.narrative: Set Flag if error expected?

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: User Type
input.narrative: Type of the user want to select
input.expr: "Create one or more Active Directory users"

output.name: Error Message
output.narrative: The error message read when pressing next.

stage.name: Create AD user (Search with sith Credentials)

input.name: Role
input.narrative: A collection of roles you want to give the user.

output.name: Error Message
output.narrative: The error message read when pressing next.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: GIVEN that Blue Prism is configurated to work with Active Directory.

stage.name: Note2
stage.narrative: WHEN the Active Directory Auth type is Enabled THEN Offer the choice of Blue Prism Native, Active Directory as available authentication types

stage.name: Check Active Directory Auth is Available
Note3
stage.narrative: WHEN I create a user using the Active Directory wizard THEN an Active Directory user is created

stage.name: Create AD user (Search with sith Credentials)

input.name: Search
input.narrative: write the type of the filter that you want to search with

input.name: Type of Filter
input.narrative: Write the Type of the Filter that you want to set

input.name: Enable checkbox
input.narrative: select the checkbox

input.name: Active Directory Name
input.narrative: The UPN that you want to set

resource.action: User Wizard - Setting Active Directory Name

input.narrative: A collection of roles you want to give the user.

stage.name: Note4
stage.narrative: When i entered the search root as the root domain And i have selected the default credentials Then the default credentials are set.

stage.name: Note5
stage.narrative: When i entered the search root as the root domain And i have entered the custome credentials Then the custom credentials are set.

input.name: Search Root
input.narrative: Enter the search root value that you want to search with

resource.action: User Wizard - Press Search Using Other Credentials

input.name: Input custome credential
input.narrative: Select the credential type

resource.action: User Wizard - Select Input custom credential(AD)

input.name: Username
input.narrative: Enter the user name for the input credential

resource.action: User Wizard - Write Username (AD input Credential)

input.name: Password
input.narrative: Enter the password for the input credential

resource.action: User Wizard - Write Password (AD Input Credential)

input.name: Search Root
input.narrative: Enter the search root value that you want to search with

resource.action: User Wizard - Press Search Using Other Credentials

input.name: Input custome credential
input.narrative: Select the credential type

resource.action: User Wizard - Select Input custom credential(AD)

input.name: Username
input.narrative: Enter the user name for the input credential

resource.action: User Wizard - Write Username (AD input Credential)

input.name: Password
input.narrative: Enter the password for the input credential

resource.action: User Wizard - Write Password (AD Input Credential)

input.name: Search Root
input.narrative: Enter the search root value that you want to search with

resource.action: User Wizard - Press Search Using Other Credentials

input.name: Use Default Credential type
input.narrative: Select the type of credential that you want to use

resource.action: User Wizard - Select Use Default Credentials (AD)
